Row.Text: Balanced, temperate trade‑wind world with a classic three‑band layout. Robust sea lanes, gentle coast ruggedness and small island chains. Rainfall blends latitude bands with prevailing winds; earthlike refinements add believable rain shadows and greener river corridors. Tuned for Huge maps.

A tectonic showcase: one broad central continent with a towering convergent ridge and rifted flanks to the east and west. Outer bands are true oceans with only small island chains; strategic sea lanes remain open. Climate refinements yield believable rain shadows, coastal humidity, and greener river corridors. Tuned for Huge maps.
